price: Cyangwa bavuga ko (Muhamadi) ari we wayihimbye? (Si ko bimeze), ahubwo yo ni ukuri kwaturutse kwa Nyagasani wawe ngo uyifashishe mu kuburira abantu batagezweho n’umuburizi uwo ari we wese mbere yawe kugira ngo bayoboke.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۚ بَلۡ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أَتَىٰهُم مِّن نَّذِيرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna if'tarāhu bal huwa al-ḥaqu min rabbika litundhira qawman mā atāhum min nadhīrin min qablika laʿallahum yahtadūna
